name: Apocardalypse
description:
Reveal dark sides of the cards and destroy the enemies in this tactic card game with rng and cool art.

CONTROLS:

Mouse Left Click: Drag and draw cards

Mouse Right Click: Reveal dark side of the card

Space: Faster way to draw cards

Credits:

Art and design: Monni

Code and design: Tipu

Music and ideas: Flying badger
